mapper.select: select * from (select n.*, rownum as rnum from (select * from vwUserBook where email = #{email} and visit_date >= to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') order by book_date asc, visit_date asc) n) where rnum between #{startIndex} and #{endIndex}

SELECT vw.*,(select count(*) from tblReview where user_book_seq = vw.user_book_seq) as reviewCount FROM vwUserBook vw where email = #{email} and visit_date < to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') order by book_date desc, visit_date desc
